1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah performing ablution, wearing a Qatari turban. He put his hand beneath the turban and wiped the front part of his head, and he did not take the turban off

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْعِمَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning wiping over the turban
